32#ifndef _DRM_DRMFB_H_
33#define _DRM_DRMFB_H_
34
35#include <sys/device_if.h>
36
37#include <dev/wsfb/genfbvar.h>
38
39struct drm_fb_helper;
40struct drm_fb_helper_surface_sizes;
41
42struct drmfb_attach_args;
43struct drmfb_params;
44struct drmfb_softc;
45
46struct drmfb_params {
47 /*
48 * Framebuffer mmap.
49 */
50 paddr_t (*dp_mmapfb)(struct drmfb_softc *, off_t, int);
51
52 /*
53 * Other mmap, e.g. for arbitrary PCI BARs. Available only to
54 * users with privileges for access to unmanaged memory.
55 */
56 paddr_t (*dp_mmap)(struct drmfb_softc *, off_t, int);
57
58 /*
59 * Ioctl handler. Must handle:
60 *
61 * - WSDISPLAYIO_GET_BUSID
62 * - WSDISPLAYIO_GTYPE
63 *
64 * May add or override anything else. Return EPASSTHROUGH to
65 * defer.
66 */
67 int (*dp_ioctl)(struct drmfb_softc *, unsigned long,
68 void *, int, struct lwp *);
69 /* XXX Kludge! */
70 bool (*dp_is_vga_console)(struct drm_device *);
71 void (*dp_disable_vga)(struct drm_device *);
72};
73
74struct drmfb_attach_args {
75 device_t da_dev;
76 struct drm_fb_helper *da_fb_helper;
77 const struct drm_fb_helper_surface_size *da_fb_sizes;
78 void *da_fb_vaddr;
79 uint32_t da_fb_linebytes;
80 const struct drmfb_params *da_params;
81};
82
83/* Treat as opaque. Must be first member of device softc. */
84struct drmfb_softc {
85 struct genfb_softc sc_genfb; /* XXX Must be first. */
86 struct drmfb_attach_args sc_da;
87};
88
89int drmfb_attach(struct drmfb_softc *, const struct drmfb_attach_args *);
90int drmfb_detach(struct drmfb_softc *, int);
91bool drmfb_shutdown(struct drmfb_softc *, int);
92
93#endif /* _DRM_DRMFB_H_ */
94
